channel.title: Home on Qrypt
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Qrypt

item.title: Quickstart: Distributed Key Generation
item.description: Sample Code Find the finalized code for this quickstart on GitHub. Prerequisites A Qrypt Account. Create an account for free. Install CMake. (Windows) Install git bash - comes with typical git install. (Optional) Install Visual Studio Code. Setup Clone the repo containing this quickstart to a local folder on a Linux, Mac or Windows platform. Retrieve a token from the Qrypt Portal and create an environment variable QRYPT_TOKEN for it.

item.title: Quickstart: Local Key Generation

(Windows) Install git bash - comes with typical git install. (Optional) Install Visual Studio Code. Setup Clone the repo containing this quickstart to a local folder on a Linux, Mac or Windows platform. Retrieve a token from the Qrypt Portal and create an environment variable QRYPT_TOKEN for it.
